trustfund:
TF030614-ITALIAN CTF (EE) FY05 - ECA
            (ALBANIA, AZERBAIJAN, BOSNIA-HERZEGOVINA, B,TF053329-PHRD-TAJIKISTAN: STRUCTURAL
            ADJUSTMENT CREDIT III

abstracts.cdata!:
The Programmatic Development Policy
            Grant for Tajikistan is the first programmatic operation of
            the Bank in Tajikistan to support the government's
            reform program outlined in the PRSP. The operation will
            support a strategic set of policy reforms in private sector
            development, public sector management and social service
            delivery. The operation will also provide continuity of the
            reform initiated by the Bank's previous adjustment
            operations (SAC 1 and 2). Policy measures supported by this
            operation have a strong cross cutting emphasis on improving
            governance. The program is divided into two pillars with the
            following components: Pillar 1, Promoting Private Sector
            Development, is comprised of: Component 1, maintaining
            macroeconomic stability; Component 2, improve investment
            climate through reform of licensing and inspections,
            increasing transparency of the privatization process and
            promoting market competition; and Component 3, reforming
            regulatory frameworks through separating policy making and
            regulation function in key strategic sectors (i.e. aviation,
            cotton and energy). Pillar 2, Improving Public Sector
            Management and Public Service Delivery, is comprised of
            Component 1, public sector management reform through
            restructuring core public institutions, reforming civil
            service management and the wage system, strengthening the
            medium-term expenditure framework; and Component 2,
            improving social service delivery in health and education.
